message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. It's a fair start, and I'm sure we can find a mutually beneficial outcome in the future rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 60/40 is a more reasonable starting point. Let's see if we can do better in the next round.
I'm willing to come down to 70/30. We both need to compromise to reach an agreement.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the inflation we've experienced.
I'm still not convinced that 70/30 is fair, considering the initial proposal was 90/10. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think 45/55 is a more reasonable compromise.
